title: Kindred w
body: why do i have to cast kindreds w. Why would anyone ever want to cast it. stop changing champion abilities and make new champions. you are ruining the current champions people like and making people quit. I quit for awhile because I can't play annivia anymore because of her ult change. yes people like these changes, but they are only people who don't main. now i have to find a new jungler

replies.body: Anivia is one of my mains (probably my second main behind Veigar) and I like her just fine as sge is now. I have played her since season 2 and she was consistantly too strong until that change. Honestly, 3 second or so cd e's are probably making her just a hair too good now. Not worth changing due to low play rate though.
I honestly don't mind casting her W,, it was weird at first but whatever
so u cant play anivia anymore since her ult takes a bit more skill? along with you know quickcast existing which solves kindred w problem your having
